statements: DELETE FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'ISO 9001' AND issuing_body = 'ISO' AND certification_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_date < '2022-01-01' AND issuing_body = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM certification_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'Quality Assurance Institute' AND agency_id = 5;
DELETE FROM CertifyingOrganizations WHERE country = 'USA' AND org_name = 'Example Org'
DELETE FROM product_certification_relationship WHERE product_id = 10 AND certification_id = 3;
DELETE FROM product_certification_relationship WHERE product_id = 25 AND certification_id = 15 AND agency_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' AND category = 'Electronics';
